### PR summary [39823be6b7](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/14108/commits/39823be6b7c172e5cf2bcfe3fc0eaec0c8f54b00)

#### Import changes

No significant changes to the import graph

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ PreStoneCech`
`+ continuous_preStoneCechExtend`
`+ continuous_preStoneCechUnit`
`+ denseRange_preStoneCechUnit`
`+ eq_if_preStoneCechUnit_eq`
`+ instance : CompactSpace (PreStoneCech α)`
`+ instance : CompactSpace (StoneCech α)`
`+ instance : T2Space (StoneCech α)`
`+ instance : TopologicalSpace (PreStoneCech α)`
`+ instance : TopologicalSpace (StoneCech α)`
`+ instance [Inhabited α] : Inhabited (PreStoneCech α)`
`+ instance [Inhabited α] : Inhabited (StoneCech α)`
`+ preStoneCechCompat`
`+ preStoneCechExtend`
`+ preStoneCechExtend_extends`
`+ preStoneCechUnit`
`+ preStoneCech_hom_ext`
`- StoneCech.compactSpace`
`- StoneCech.t2Space`
`- convergent_eqv_pure`
`- instance : TopologicalSpace (StoneCech α) := by unfold StoneCech; infer_instance`
`- instance [Inhabited α] : Inhabited (StoneCech α) := by unfold StoneCech; infer_instance`
`- stoneCechSetoid`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh short <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh <optional_commit>
```
</details>

</details>

One nitpick but otherwise LGTM
